title: Route Time, Cost & Fuel Planner
description: Plan trip ETA, fuel needs, and estimated costs in one view.
pageDescription: Estimate drive time, total time, fuel volume, and total route cost before you leave.

sections.title: Inputs Used
content: Distance, average speed, and planned break time.
Fuel efficiency and current fuel price.
Optional toll totals for the route.

sections.title: Output Metrics
content: Driving time and full trip time including breaks.
Estimated liters needed including practical overhead.
Estimated total trip cost from fuel plus tolls.

sections.title: Planning Tips
content: Use a slightly lower average speed than ideal map estimates.
Add at least one extra break on routes longer than 6 hours.
Recalculate when fuel price changes significantly before departure.
